patch 8.2.1078: highlight and match functionality together in one file

Solution:   Move match functionality to a separate file. (Yegappan Lakshmanan,
            closes #6352)

Solution:   Update stored loop lines when finding line breaks.

Solution:   Skip a line break.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/9215f01218b2ed2cfe49c1f43fcf342bd9ffdded|patch 8.2.1074: Vim9: no line break allowed after some operators>
patch 8.2.1074: Vim9: no line break allowed after some operators

Problem:    Vim9: no line break allowed after some operators.
Solution:   Skip a line break after the operator.  Add
            eval_may_get_next_line() to simplify checking for a line break.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1074: Vim9: no line break allowed after some operators · vim/vim@9215f01
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1074: Vim9: no line break allowed after some operators · vim/vim@9215f01
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: no line break allowed after some operators. Solution: Skip a line break after the operator. Add eval_may_get_next_line() to simplify checking for a line break.
